creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: top band of black velvet; other three borders are green silk damask; center rectangle is appliqued layers of silk with mainly abstract designs embroidered over; two small squares in upper part and one larger square in lower part in red, green, black and white; 5 narrow appliqued strips frame the embroidery; lining is blue and white woven cotton
title: Baby Carrier
